post:
Hello guys,

Ikoula customers can now deploy vm in Frankfurt, Germany.

The price grid is the same as France zone, from 5.2 euros deploy a vm connected to German internet networks.
If you want to test pm me i can give you a 10€ coupon code to deploy a vm. 

New extranet feature deploy a vm in one click is available for Germany zone.
For those who have not already seen it, check the video below.

Ikoula public cloud became docker friendly <a href="https://ikoula.wiki/help/Comment_deployer_un_container_Docker_sur_une_instance_CoreOS_Cloudstack_by_Ikoula/en">Ikoula.wiki guide</a>

Network will soon provide a looking glass, i'll tell you when it's ready.

Feel free to ask if you have any other questions.

Have a nice day.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKlkYoXnaKE&feature=youtu.be&a
